tool_description: Performs response spectrum analysis or time history analysis to determine dynamic response of structure under seismic loading.

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis: response_spectrum or time_history

modal_periods.description: Natural periods of vibration modes in seconds

modal_participation_factors.description: Modal participation factors for each mode

modal_masses.description: Modal masses for each mode in kg

response_spectrum_periods.description: Period values for design response spectrum

response_spectrum_accelerations.description: Spectral acceleration values for design response spectrum

combination_method.description: Modal combination method: CQC or SRSS

scale_factor.description: Scale factor for ground motion (positive number)

error_messages: Invalid analysis type: Must be response_spectrum or time_history. Check analysis requirements.
Modal data inconsistency: Arrays for periods, participation factors, and masses must have same length.
Response spectrum data mismatch: Period and acceleration arrays must have same length.
Invalid damping ratio: Must be between 0.01-0.10 (1%-10%). Use 5% if unknown.
Invalid combination method: Use CQC for closely spaced modes, SRSS for well-separated modes.
Insufficient modes: Include enough modes to capture 90% mass participation in each direction.
usage: Input modal properties from eigenvalue analysis and response spectrum from ground motion selection. Tool performs dynamic analysis and combines modal responses using specified method.

total_base_shear.description: Total base shear from dynamic analysis in kN

mass_participation.description: Cumulative mass participation by mode as percentages
